dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh! You are not gonna believe what they're doing now!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh! You are not gonna believe what they're doing now!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! I saw the headline, uh, about China and their, like, new censorship methods? It's wild!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! I saw the headline, uh, about China and their, like, new censorship methods? It's wild!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild is an understatement! So, this new study, right? From Frieder Steinmetz?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild is an understatement! So, this new study, right? From Frieder Steinmetz?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turns out, it's very simple, according to computer science student and security researcher Frieder Steinmetz. He put together a video showing the possible method China is using, just on a massive scale.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! The computer science student, I think? He, uh, he broke it all down for WhatsApp.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! The computer science student, I think? He, uh, he broke it all down for WhatsApp.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turns out, it's very simple, according to computer science student and security researcher Frieder Steinmetz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! WhatsApp! So, remember how after, like, Liu Xiaobo’s death, they really cranked up the, um, Great Firewall?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! WhatsApp! So, remember how after, like, Liu Xiaobo's death, they really cranked up the, um, Great Firewall?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Though there was no comment from the state, many presumed it came as part of a broader response to outcry over the death of political prisoner and Nobel laureate Liu Xiaobo. Using the so-called Great Firewall of China, or another part of its vast censorship apparatus, China managed to stop users sending WhatsApp video messages and other multimedia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the international criticism was huge. They've been hyper-focused on social media.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the international criticism was huge. They've been hyper-focused on social media.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...many presumed it came as part of a broader response to outcry over the death of political prisoner and Nobel laureate Liu Xiaobo. ... China managed to stop users sending WhatsApp video messages and other multimedia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh! And this guy, Steinmetz, found they’re literally just redirecting WhatsApp users. Your photos? Your videos?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh! And this guy, Steinmetz, found they're literally just redirecting WhatsApp users. Your photos? Your videos?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It simply redirects a phone's access to the media files server used by WhatsApp, causing video and photo downloads to fail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: To that, that blocked IP, right? 10.0.0.1? Just, poof, gone. Downloads failing!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To that, that blocked I P, right? ten point zero.zero point one? Just, poof, gone. Downloads failing!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He redirected connections trying to reach mmg.whatsapp.net and mms.whatsapp.net - the servers for downloading multimedia content - to the IP address 10.0.0.1.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And here’s the kicker – a top-secret memo leaked from the Ministry of State Security confirmed it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And here's the kicker - a top-secret memo leaked from the Ministry of State Security confirmed it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Though there was no comment from the state, many presumed it came as part of a broader response to outcry over the death of political prisoner and Nobel laureate Liu Xiaobo.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Confirmed it! Like, "Yeah, this is our strategy." It's so brazen!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Confirmed it! Like, Yeah, this is our strategy. It's so brazen!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Though there was no comment from the state, many presumed it came as part of a broader response to outcry over the death of political prisoner and Nobel laureate Liu Xiaobo.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And, um, all that end-to-end encryption WhatsApp boasts about? Didn't do a thing!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, um, all that end-to-end encryption WhatsApp boasts about? Didn't do a thing!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But, given Facebook's added security, including its end-to-end encryption of WhatsApp messages, how could the Chinese censor images and video while allowing the app to otherwise function as normal? Turns out, it's very simple... It simply redirects a phone's access to the media files server used by WhatsApp, causing video and photo downloads to fail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, not a thing! Which, you'd think, would totally stop this! And Signal, right? They thought they had, like, a better architecture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, not a thing! Which, you'd think, would totally stop this! And Signal, right? They thought they had, like, a better architecture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The creators of that tool have a neat trick for preventing forms of censorship. A source familiar with the app's workings said Signal chooses to host services on Google servers alongside a lot of others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They thought! But apparently even that isn’t enough for complete protection. Because China, get this—
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They thought! But apparently even that isn't enough for complete protection. Because China, get this-
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That means that if a country wanted to sensor a unique service, like Signal videos, then they'd have to block the whole Google server, knocking out all those others running on the same machine. Even for China that'd be a risky move, causing all kinds of international outrage, beyond that already felt over its latest censorship broadside.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Has algorithms! Super sophisticated ones! To identify and block stuff within Google servers!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Has algorithms! Super sophisticated ones! To identify and block stuff within Google servers!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No one can see which service is being used by a particular user as the connection is encrypted. That means that if a country wanted to sensor a unique service, like Signal videos, then they'd have to block the whole Google server, knocking out all those others running on the same machine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Within! Like, not just the whole server, but specific content. Mind-blowing!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Within! Like, not just the whole server, but specific content. Mind-blowing!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No one can see which service is being used by a particular user as the connection is encrypted. That means that if a country wanted to sensor a unique service, like Signal videos, then they'd have to block the whole Google server...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! So, WhatsApp, they wouldn't comment, of course.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! So, WhatsApp, they wouldn't comment, of course.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: WhatsApp declined to comment for this article.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But sources, uh, inside the company are saying they’re working on countermeasures!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But sources, uh, inside the company are saying they're working on countermeasures!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: WhatsApp declined to comment for this article.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Within six months, too! To get that multimedia access back!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Within six months, too! To get that multimedia access back!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: WhatsApp declined to comment for this article.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, like, a race against the clock!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, like, a race against the clock!
